1.title: Not So Secret Service
1.plot: After Mojo Jojo's latest creation threatens to blast him into tiny bits, the Powerpuff Girls are forced to take Mojo in.

2.title: Worship
2.plot: When the Fashionistas unveil their new mind controlling perfume, The Powerpuff Girls must find a way to stop them before Townsville falls under their spell.

3.title: Blossom3
3.plot: After being blasted by Duplikate, Blossom turns into a triple threat.

4.title: Mojo the Great
4.plot: In an effort to make himself "great," Mojo steals the powers that makes the each of the Powerpuff Girls the heroes they are.

5.title: Trouble Clef
5.plot: When Morbucks realizes that The Powerpuff Girls see her as a villain and not a friend, she sets out to turn the town against them.

6.title: Save the Date
6.plot: Ms. Keane is nervous about a first date.

7.title: Can't Buy Love
7.plot: When Morbucks falls in love, she finds the first thing money can't buy.

8.title: Largo
8.plot: When a mysterious rain cloud plagues Townsville, Bubbles learns things aren't what they seem.

9.title: Blundercup
9.plot: Buttercup is knocked off-kilter by a mysterious force.

10.title: Ragnarock and Roll
10.plot: When an ancient prophecy spells doom for Townsville, the girls must race to stop it.

11.title: Total Eclipse of the Kart
11.plot: The Powerpuff Girls compete in a race against some of their most vicious villains, to win whatever is in the Mayor's "Mysterious Box Of Mystery."

12.title: The Long Skate Home
12.plot: After they get accused of a crime they didn't commit, The Powerpuff Girls and The Derbytantes have to find a way to clear their name!

13.title: Quarantine
13.plot: After a chemical spill, the girls and Mojo find themselves trapped together.

14.title: In the Doghouse
14.plot: Buttercup must go it alone to save her family from a kidnapping.

15.title: Salamander
15.plot: When the professor is kidnapped, the girls must go to a mysterious island to save him.

16.title: Small World
16.plot: The Powerpuff Girls are sent to the arctic on a dangerous mission to find the key to saving the day.

17.title: Witch's Crew
17.plot: On Halloween Night, Morbucks summons a monster that she didn't expect. And the Powerpuff girls now as withes must to a stop to it.

18.title: The Gift
18.plot: The girls must replace the Professor's Christmas present on Christmas Eve.

1.title: Escape from Monster Island
1.plot: While Bubbles tries to decide whether to take Blossom or Buttercup to a concert, the girls head to Monster Island to rescue the Mayor.

2.title: Princess Buttercup
2.plot: Buttercup starts hanging out with a bad crowd, so Princess Morbucks tries to join the team.

3.title: The Stayover
3.plot: Recovering from a candy hangover, Blossom and Buttercup retrace their steps to find Bubbles.

4.title: Painbow
4.plot: A rainbow makes everyone in Townsville unnaturally happy.

5.title: Horn, Sweet Horn
5.plot: At Bubbles' request, the Professor tries to make Donny the Pony a unicorn, but Donny is turned into a monster that threatens Townsville.

6.title: Man Up
6.plot: Buttercup starts a new-age lifestyle to calm down when her aggression allows the villain Manboy to escape.

7.title: Bye Bye Bellum
7.plot: The girls are overworked helping the Mayor when Miss Sara Bellum goes on vacation.

8.title: Little Octi Lost
8.plot: Buttercup hides Bubbles' doll Octi in the bushes to teach her a lesson, but the lesson backfires when PackRat takes it.

9.title: Strong-Armed
9.plot: Bubbles wears a robotic cast for her broken arm and the cast proves to be useful in fighting PackRat.

10.title: Power-Up Puff
10.plot: Buttercup and Bubbles level up during a fight, leaving Blossom to wonder if she'll level up too.

11.title: Tiara Trouble
11.plot: A mysterious tiara places a curse on the Townsville Beauty, Talent and All-Around Flair Pageant.

12.title: The Wrinklegruff Gals
12.plot: The girls turn into senior citizens when they drink a potion meant to make them older.

13.title: Arachno-Romance
13.plot: The Professor has a new girlfriend, but the Girls aren't happy about it.

14.title: Puffdora's Box
14.plot: Blossom accidentally unleashes evil spirits when she gets overzealous with the spring cleaning.

15.title: Blue Ribbon Blues
15.plot: Blossom tries to impress a famous scientist who visits the school.

16.title: Frenemy
16.plot: The girls end up as accomplices in their new friend's adventurous crimes.

17.title: Once Upon a Townsville
17.plot: Chased by a dragon, Princess Bluebell accidentally crosses from her fairytale dimension to the Powerpuff Girls's world. She explains through song and dance that she's a damsel in distress. The Girls try to teach her to be independent.

18.title: Man Up 2: Still Maning
18.plot: When someone steals all the water in Townsville, it's up to the Girls to race through the Townsville Wastelands to get it back.

19.title: Viral Spiral
19.plot: After the new trendy app was created in Townsville, the powerpuff girls soon uncover a dangerous glitch in the program.

20.title: Bubbles of the Opera
20.plot: Viral Spiral: When the Amoeba Boys wreak havoc on the internet, Bubbles has to hack her sisters in to stop them. / Bubbles of the Opera: When Bubbles gets a bad school photo, it sends her into an existential tailspin of darkness.

21.title: Sister Sitter
21.plot: When Blossom and Bubbles get sick, Buttercup volunteers to take care of them for the day.

22.title: Odd Bubbles Out
22.plot: Donny the Unicorn and Big Joey participate in the Student/Unicom Exchange Program. Bubbles has many planned activities but Donny is doing them with Chelsea. At first Bubbles is upset but decides to meet Her since Donny likes Chelsea so much. Buttercup thinks Chelsea is a Bubbles 2.0. Donny and Bubbles argue later that night and Donny decides to stay at Chelseas place. Trying to comfort Bubbles; Blossom and Buttercup realize Donny is likely in trouble and set out to try and save him.

23.title: Presidential Punchout
23.plot: When Morbucks enters the Student Body President race, Blossom sinks to her level to secure the win.

24.title: Cheep Thrills
24.plot: Cheep Thrills: After finding a baby monster in the park, Bubbles insists on adopting it without considering the consequences! / Fashion Forward: When the Fashionistas launch a new line of brainwashing clothing, it's up to the Powerpuff Girls to stop the fashion trend before it's too late.

25.title: Fashion Forward
25.plot: Cheep Thrills: After finding a baby monster in the park, Bubbles insists on adopting it without considering the consequences! / Fashion Forward: When the Fashionistas launch a new line of brainwashing clothing, it's up to the Powerpuff Girls to stop the fashion trend before it's too late.

26.title: In the Garden of Good and Eddie
26.plot: When the girls try a quick-fix on their neglected veggie garden, they are left with a giant, mooching tomato worm they must care for.

27.title: Road Trippin'
27.plot: In The Garden of Good and Eddie: When the girls try a quick-fix on their neglected veggie garden, they are left with a giant, mooching tomato worm they must care for. / Road Trippin': Realizing her and the Professor don't have much in common, Bubbles schedules a road trip with just the two of them.

28.title: The Big Sleep
28.plot: The Big Sleep: When the Professor's latest invention wreaks havoc in the house, it's up to the Powerpuff Girls to stop it before it escapes. / The Secret Life of Blossom Powerpuff: When Blossom can't join her favorite school club, she imagines what her life would be like if she joined other clubs.

29.title: The Secret Life of Blossom Powerpuff
29.plot: When Blossom can't join her favorite school club, she imagines what her life would be like if she joined other clubs.

30.title: Halt and Catch Silico
30.plot: Halt and Catch Silico: When a series of negative articles about the Powerpuff Girls are posted on the Internet, the girls track them back to Silico. / Secret Swapper of Doom: When the girls get a Paper Fortune Teller that can predict the future if they tell it a secret, they begin to rely on it to predict everything. But when it predicts the Powerpuff Girls will be destroyed, the girls must find a way to stop the future from happening.

31.title: Secret Swapper of Doom
31.plot: When the Girls get a Paper Fortune Teller that can predict the future if they tell it a secret, they begin to rely on it to predict everything.

32.title: Rainy Day
32.plot: Its a rainy day and the girls are stuck inside and bored. Trouble quickly follows when the girls play with the Time Dasher in the Professors lab.

33.title: The Squashening
33.plot: Rainy Day: The girls get into trouble when left to entertain themselves on a rainy day. / The Squashening: To escape a monster, the girls have to tell him a scary story.

34.title: Electric Buttercup
34.plot: Buttercup gets more than she bargained for when she makes a deal with a cool '80s metalhead to get a sweet new guitar.

35.title: Professor Proofed
35.plot: Electric Buttercup: Buttercup gets more than she bargained for when she makes a deal with a cool '80s metalhead to get a sweet new guitar. / Professor Proofed: After the Professor's latest experiment goes awry, the girls become overprotective.

36.title: Poorbucks
36.plot: When Morbucks loses her money, Blossom tries to reform her.

37.title: Snow Month
37.plot: Poorbucks: When Morbucks loses her money, Blossom tries to reform her. / Snow Month: After a snow day saves Blossom from having to face a boy who's asked her out, she decides to use her ice breath to keep it going even if that means plunging Townsville into eternal winter complete with monstrous yetis!

38.title: Somewhere Over the Swingset
38.plot: Somewhere Over the Swingset: When the girls disobey the Professor and swing all the way over the swingset, they must deal with unexpected consequences. / People Pleaser: Blossom neglects her promise to Bubbles when she takes on too many things leaving Buttercup and Bubbles to fend for themselves.

39.title: People Pleaser
39.plot: Bubbles needs help with a model biome for school, but Blossom has other priorities.

1.title: The Last Donnycorn
1.plot: When Donny the Unicorn is hunted by a seemingly unstoppable foe, the Powerpuff Girls have to find a way to save him before it's too late!

2.title: Green Wing
2.plot: At a retirement home, Buttercup meets an old woman claiming to be Green Wing, a former superhero. When her former nemesis reemerges, Buttercup teams-up with Green Wing.

3.title: 15 Minutes of Fame
3.plot: Green Wing: When volunteering at a retirement home, Buttercup meets an old woman who claims she used to be a superhero. / 15 Minutes of Fame: When Bubbles' video goes viral, she goes to great lengths to maintain her status as a big-time director.

4.title: Splitsville
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: Clawdad
5.plot: Splitsville: The girls learn to appreciate each others's style after having to each fight solo. / Clawdad: While visiting the lake, Buttercup vows to capture a legendary uncatchable crawdad.

6.title: Super Sweet 6
6.plot: Morbucks throws the biggest birthday party of all time, and Blossom is the only one not invited.

7.title: A Star Is Blossom
7.plot: Blossom thinks she's a shoo-in for the lead role in a school play. When the list comes out, it's Bubbles who wins the lead role. Blossom, resigned to playing a rock (with no dialogue at that), Blossom tries to sabotage Bubbles' appearance until a Viking queen shows up after being summoned from a book (from which the play's script comes) and takes the male lead, Jared Shapiro, to get him to marry her.

8.title: Mini Golf Madness
8.plot: Buttercup takes her game winning mini golf ball, in spite of ominous warnings of dire consequences.

9.title: Summer Bummer
9.plot: When the beach is taken over by the most excellent Bro Sharks, will the Girls be gnarly enough to save the day?

10.title: The Tell Tale Schedulebot
10.plot: After Blossom and Buttercup break Schedulebot, they'll do anything to keep the truth from coming out.

11.title: Musclecup
11.plot: Feeling inadequate as a superhero, Buttercup bulks up...to the max.

12.title: Take Your Kids to Doom Day
12.plot: The Girls spend the day with the Professor at his boring office, only to find that the office comes with a terrible secret.

13.title: The Bubbles Sitters Club
13.plot: Bubbles tries to prove that she's responsible enough to own a dog.

14.title: Buttercup vs. Math
14.plot: When Buttercup tests into Honors Math, she tries to avoid being labeled a nerd.

15.title: Home, Sweet Homesick
15.plot: When the Girls go to Camp, Blossom has a hard time leaving her schoolwork at home.

16.title: Memory Lane of Pain
16.plot: While going through the Professor's scrapbook, Bubbles starts to question if she's ever been a hero.

17.title: Spider Sense
17.plot: When a monster ruins their relaxing vacation, the Girls run into a familiar face.

18.title: Imagine That
18.plot: Imagine That: The Girls have to battle Him after he causes Bubbles' imagination to run wild. / Phantasm Chasm: After getting sucked into Jared's favorite board game, Buttercup is forced to team-up with him in order to save her sisters.

19.title: Phantasm Chasm
19.plot: After getting sucked into Jared's favorite board game, Buttercup is forced to team-up with him in order to save her sisters.

20.title: Tooth or Consequences
20.plot: Blossom Tries to evade the Dentist at all cost.

22.title: Monkey Love
22.plot: When Blossom Makes a bad call, She fears that if she tries again she might mess it up even worse.

23.title: Bridezilla
23.plot: When Mojo and Barbarus announce their wedding, the girls are convinced that they're up to no good.

24.title: Power of Four ("Find Your Bliss", "Bliss Reminisce", "Blisster Sister", "Breaking Bliss", "Blisstersweet Symphony")
24.plot: The city of Townsville is protected by three super-cute yet super-fierce little girls, Blossom, Bubbles and Buttercup, aka The Powerpuff Girls. The arrival of a new stranger to their little town is causing quite a stir. Who is this mystery person? Where does this stranger come from? One thing is for sure - Professor Utonium has a lot of explaining to do.

25.title: Midnight at the Mayor's Mansion
25.plot: When the Mayor's mansion is stalked by a vicious, ghostly monster, he calls the Powerpuff Girls for help.

26.title: The Trouble with Bubbles
26.plot: When Bubbles is overworked, she uses her coding skills to come up with a new solution.

27.title: You're a Good Man, Mojo Jojo!
27.plot: The holidays are Mojo's favorite time...for ruining everything! But this year, he may just learn the reason for the season.

28.title: Never Been Blissed
28.plot: With a parasitic alien on the loose in their school, the Powerpuff Girls and Bliss have to find a way to stop it before the big dance.

29.title: Sugar, Spice and Super Lice
29.plot: When Buttercup gets super lice, her sisters must battle them to save her.

30.title: The Buttercup Job
30.plot: Buttercup joins Jemmica in a quest for adventure, but how far will she go?

31.title: A Slight Hiccup
31.plot: The Girls must overcome their supersonic hiccups to stop the Gnat's latest evil plan!

32.title: Toy Ploy
32.plot: When Mojo kidnaps the girls' favourite snuggle toys, he gets more than he bargained for.

33.title: Derby Dollies
33.plot: When Bubbles joins the Derbytantes, Buttercup finds herself on the sidelines.

34.title: Bubbles the Blue
34.plot: When Bubbles isn't her normal, bubbly self, her sisters don't know how to handle it.

35.title: Deb O'Nair
35.plot: A classy queen of etiquette makes the Utoniums question their superhero way of life.

36.title: Man Up 3: The Good, the Bad and the Manly
36.plot: After Bubbles gets blasted with Man Boy's beard ray, she wreaks havoc in the most manly and adorable way possible.

37.title: The Blossom Flies
37.plot: Blossom's skepticism is put to the test when she believes she's encountered a space alien.

38.title: Aliver
38.plot: The Girls compete for the title of World's Greatest Superheroes!

imdb.title: The Powerpuff Girls
plot: Made from sugar, spice, everything nice and Chemical X by the Professor; Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup now use their superpowers and super cuteness to save the world (or at least Townsville) from evil villains and all things icky.::Rocketeer Raccoon
